levelPack.packDescription: Join Captain Zara on an exciting journey through the cosmos!

levels.title: Planet Match
levels.miniStory: Captain Zara needs help identifying planets in our solar system.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each planet to its special feature!

levels.hint: Mercury is closest to the Sun!
levels.funFact: Jupiter is so big that all other planets could fit inside it!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Hello! I'm Captain Zara! Let's learn about planets!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Fantastic! You know your planets well!

levels.title: Asteroid Navigation
levels.miniStory: Navigate through an asteroid field safely!
levels.hint: Go around the asteroids!
levels.funFact: Most asteroids are found between Mars and Jupiter!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Plot a safe course through the asteroids!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Excellent piloting!

levels.title: Star Brightness
levels.miniStory: Arrange stars from dimmest to brightest!
levels.hint: Start with the dimmest star!
levels.funFact: The brightest stars can be seen from millions of light-years away!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's learn about star brightness!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're a natural star mapper!

levels.title: Rocket Parts
levels.miniStory: Assemble the rocket correctly!

puzzleData.instruction: Build the rocket from bottom to top!

levels.hint: Engines go at the bottom!
levels.funFact: Saturn V rocket was as tall as a 36-story building!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Help me assemble this rocket!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Perfect rocket assembly!

levels.title: Moon Phases
levels.miniStory: Arrange the moon phases in correct order!
levels.hint: Start with the new moon!
levels.funFact: The Moon takes 29.5 days to go through all phases!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn about moon phases!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand the moon cycle!

levels.title: Space Tools
levels.miniStory: Match space tools to their uses!
levels.hint: Think about what each tool does!
levels.funFact: Telescopes help us see objects billions of light-years away!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn about space tools!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You know all the tools!

levels.title: Comet Path
levels.miniStory: Guide the comet through space!
levels.hint: Comets travel in long paths!
levels.funFact: Halley's Comet returns every 76 years!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Track this comet's path!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Perfect comet tracking!

levels.title: Planet Sizes
levels.miniStory: Arrange planets by size!
levels.hint: Mercury is the smallest planet!
levels.funFact: Jupiter is 11 times wider than Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's compare planet sizes!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You know planet sizes perfectly!

levels.title: Space Station
levels.miniStory: Match space station parts!
levels.hint: Solar panels make electricity!
levels.funFact: ISS travels at 17,500 mph!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn about space stations!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're a station expert!

levels.title: Meteor Shower
levels.miniStory: Navigate through a meteor shower!
levels.hint: Find the safest path!
levels.funFact: Earth passes through meteor showers every year!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Careful! Meteors ahead!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Amazing dodging skills!

levels.title: Galaxy Types
levels.miniStory: Match galaxies to their shapes!
levels.hint: Spiral galaxies have arms!
levels.funFact: There are 2 trillion galaxies in the universe!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Discover galaxy types!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're a galaxy expert!

levels.title: Astronaut Training
levels.miniStory: Arrange astronaut training steps!
levels.hint: Start with studying!
levels.funFact: Astronaut training takes 2-3 years!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn how astronauts train!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're ready for space!

levels.title: Solar System Order
levels.miniStory: Arrange planets from Sun outward!
levels.hint: My Very Educated Mother Just Served Us Nachos!
levels.funFact: Neptune is 30 times farther from Sun than Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Put planets in order!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Perfect solar system knowledge!

levels.title: Space Debris
levels.miniStory: Navigate through space junk!
levels.hint: Space junk is dangerous!
levels.funFact: Over 500,000 pieces of debris orbit Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Watch out for space junk!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Safe navigation!

levels.title: Star Life Cycle
levels.miniStory: Arrange star life stages!
levels.hint: Stars are born in nebulas!
levels.funFact: Our Sun is a middle-aged star!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn how stars live and die!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand star life!

levels.title: Satellite Types
levels.miniStory: Match satellites to their jobs!
levels.hint: GPS satellites help with directions!
levels.funFact: Over 2,000 satellites orbit Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn about satellites!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You know all satellite types!

levels.title: Deep Space Journey
levels.miniStory: Travel to the edge of solar system!
levels.hint: It's a long journey!
levels.funFact: Voyager 1 is the farthest human-made object!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's go to deep space!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've reached the edge!

levels.title: Space Phenomena
levels.miniStory: Match space events to descriptions!
levels.hint: Eclipses happen when Moon blocks Sun!
levels.funFact: Auroras are caused by solar wind!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Learn about space events!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You know all phenomena!

levels.title: Mission to Mars
levels.miniStory: Plan the Mars mission steps!
levels.hint: First we launch, then travel!
levels.funFact: Mars trip takes 6-9 months!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Plan our Mars mission!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Perfect mission plan!

levels.title: Space Master Challenge
levels.miniStory: The ultimate space test! Prove you're a Space Master!

puzzleData.instruction: Complete all phases to become Space Master!

levels.hint: Use everything you learned!
levels.funFact: You've mastered space exploration!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Final test! Prove you're Space Master!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ YOU DID IT! You're now Space Master! The universe is yours to explore!

levels.title: Exoplanet Discovery
levels.miniStory: Scientists have found planets outside our solar system! Help identify different types of exoplanets.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each exoplanet type to its description!

levels.hint: Exoplanets are planets that orbit stars other than our Sun!
levels.funFact: Scientists have discovered over 5,000 exoplanets so far!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's discover new worlds beyond our solar system!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Amazing! You're a true planet hunter!

levels.title: Alien Worlds
levels.miniStory: Imagine what alien planets might look like! Navigate through strange new worlds.

puzzleData.instruction: Guide your spaceship through the alien landscape!

levels.hint: Alien planets might have purple skies, two suns, or floating rocks!
levels.funFact: Some exoplanets might have glass rain or oceans of lava!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Welcome to a world unlike anything on Earth!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've explored an alien world!

levels.title: Space Colonies
levels.miniStory: Humans are planning to live on other planets! Learn what we need for a space colony.

puzzleData.instruction: Put the colony building steps in order!

levels.hint: First land, then build shelter, find resources, and finally bring more people!
levels.funFact: NASA plans to send humans to Mars in the 2030s!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's build humanity's first space colony!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Perfect! You know how to colonize space!

levels.title: Mars Base Alpha
levels.miniStory: You're the commander of the first Mars base! Match each facility to its purpose.

puzzleData.instruction: Match each Mars base facility to what it does!

levels.hint: A Mars base needs power, water, food, shelter, and protection!
levels.funFact: Mars has only 38% of Earth's gravity - you could jump 3 times higher!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Welcome to Mars Base Alpha, Commander!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Excellent work, Commander! The base is operational!

levels.title: Moon Mining
levels.miniStory: The Moon has valuable resources! Navigate through the mining operation.

puzzleData.instruction: Guide the mining rover to collect lunar resources!

levels.hint: The Moon has helium-3, water ice, and rare metals!
levels.funFact: Moon dust is so sharp it can cut through spacesuits!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Time to mine the Moon's treasures!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Great job! You've collected valuable lunar resources!

levels.title: Asteroid Mining
levels.miniStory: Asteroids contain precious metals worth trillions! Learn about asteroid mining.

puzzleData.instruction: Show the steps of asteroid mining!

levels.hint: First find a good asteroid, then send a ship to mine it!
levels.funFact: One asteroid could contain $10 trillion worth of platinum!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's mine space rocks for treasure!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Incredible! You're now a space prospector!

levels.title: Space Tourism
levels.miniStory: Space travel is becoming a vacation! Match tourists with their space activities.
levels.hint: Space tourists can float, see Earth, and experience amazing views!
levels.funFact: In space, you see a sunrise every 90 minutes!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Welcome aboard the space tourism flight!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Hope you enjoyed your space vacation!

levels.title: Orbital Hotels
levels.miniStory: Design the perfect space hotel! Navigate through the hotel layout.

puzzleData.instruction: Guide guests through the space hotel!

levels.hint: Space hotels need bedrooms, restaurants, observation decks, and gyms!
levels.funFact: The first space hotel could open by 2027!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Welcome to the Orbital Grand Hotel!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Your guests had an amazing stay!

levels.title: Space Elevator
levels.miniStory: Imagine an elevator to space! Learn how this amazing idea could work.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how to build a space elevator!

levels.hint: A space elevator would be a cable from Earth to space!
levels.funFact: A space elevator could make space travel 100 times cheaper!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's build an elevator to the stars!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Amazing! You've revolutionized space travel!

levels.title: Warp Drive Dreams
levels.miniStory: Could we travel faster than light? Match sci-fi concepts with real science!

puzzleData.instruction: Match future space tech to how it works!

levels.hint: Scientists are working on ways to travel between stars!
levels.funFact: With current tech, it would take 80,000 years to reach the nearest star!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's dream about the future of space travel!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're thinking like a future space pioneer!

levels.title: Time Dilation
levels.miniStory: Einstein discovered that time moves differently in space! Learn about this mind-bending concept.
levels.hint: The faster you travel, the slower time moves for you!
levels.funFact: If you traveled at 99% light speed for 1 year, 7 years would pass on Earth!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Ready to bend time itself?
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Mind-blowing! You understand Einstein's theory!

levels.title: Wormholes
levels.miniStory: Wormholes might be shortcuts through space-time! Navigate through this cosmic tunnel.

puzzleData.instruction: Find the path through the wormhole!

levels.hint: Wormholes are theoretical tunnels connecting distant parts of the universe!
levels.funFact: A wormhole could theoretically let you travel across the galaxy instantly!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's take a shortcut through space-time!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Amazing! You navigated a wormhole!

levels.title: Parallel Universe
levels.miniStory: Could there be other universes? Match multiverse theories!
levels.hint: Scientists think there might be infinite parallel universes!
levels.funFact: In some parallel universe, you might be a superhero!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's explore the idea of parallel worlds!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Incredible! The multiverse is mind-blowing!

levels.title: Dark Matter
levels.miniStory: Most of the universe is invisible! Learn about mysterious dark matter.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how scientists discovered dark matter!

levels.hint: Dark matter doesn't emit light but has gravity!
levels.funFact: Dark matter makes up 85% of all matter in the universe!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's hunt for invisible matter!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You found the universe's hidden secret!

levels.title: Dark Energy
levels.miniStory: The universe is expanding faster and faster! Dark energy is pushing it apart.
levels.hint: Dark energy is making the universe expand faster!
levels.funFact: Dark energy makes up 68% of the entire universe!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ The universe is growing! Let's find out why!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand the force expanding the cosmos!

levels.title: Quantum Physics
levels.miniStory: At the tiniest scale, physics gets weird! Match quantum concepts.
levels.hint: Quantum physics is the science of the super tiny!
levels.funFact: Particles can be in two places at once until you look at them!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Welcome to the weird world of quantum physics!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Your brain just expanded to quantum level!

levels.title: String Theory
levels.miniStory: What if everything is made of tiny vibrating strings? Explore this wild idea!

puzzleData.instruction: Show how string theory explains everything!

levels.hint: String theory says everything is made of vibrating strings!
levels.funFact: String theory requires 11 dimensions to work!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ What if the universe is like a cosmic symphony?
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand one of physics' biggest ideas!

levels.title: Multiverse
levels.miniStory: Navigate through different possible universes in the multiverse!
levels.hint: Each universe might have different laws of physics!
levels.funFact: There might be infinite versions of you in parallel universes!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's jump between universes!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've mastered multiverse travel!

levels.title: Big Crunch
levels.miniStory: Will the universe expand forever or collapse back? Match theories about the universe's fate!

puzzleData.instruction: Match theories about the universe's end!

levels.hint: Scientists aren't sure how the universe will end!
levels.funFact: The universe might end in a Big Freeze in trillions of years!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's think about the universe's ultimate fate!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Deep! You understand cosmic destiny!

levels.title: Heat Death
levels.miniStory: In the far future, the universe might reach maximum entropy. Learn about the ultimate end!

puzzleData.instruction: Show the universe's journey to heat death!

levels.hint: Heat death means the universe reaches maximum disorder!
levels.funFact: Heat death won't happen for 10^100 years - that's a 1 with 100 zeros!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's explore the universe's final chapter!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Wow! You've seen the end of everything!

levels.title: First Contact
levels.miniStory: What if we meet aliens? Match protocols for first contact with extraterrestrial life!
levels.hint: First contact with aliens would be the biggest event in human history!
levels.funFact: Scientists have a protocol ready for if we detect alien signals!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Are we alone? Let's prepare for first contact!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're ready to meet aliens!

levels.title: Alien Language
levels.miniStory: How would we talk to aliens? Navigate through communication challenges!

puzzleData.instruction: Find a path to communicate with aliens!

levels.hint: Math and science might be universal languages!
levels.funFact: The Voyager spacecraft carries a golden record with Earth sounds and images!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's learn to speak alien!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You found a way to communicate!

levels.title: Interstellar Travel
levels.miniStory: Traveling between stars takes thousands of years! Match interstellar travel concepts.
levels.hint: The nearest star is 4.2 light-years away!
levels.funFact: With current technology, it would take 80,000 years to reach the nearest star!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's journey between the stars!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand interstellar travel!

levels.title: Generation Ship
levels.miniStory: A generation ship travels for centuries! Show the journey across generations.

puzzleData.instruction: Show life on a generation ship!

levels.hint: People born on the ship would never see Earth or the destination!
levels.funFact: A generation ship to Proxima Centauri would need 100+ generations!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Imagine living your whole life traveling to a star!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand the sacrifice of interstellar travel!

levels.title: Dyson Sphere
levels.miniStory: A Dyson Sphere captures all of a star's energy! Navigate this megastructure.
levels.hint: A Dyson Sphere would be the ultimate energy source!
levels.funFact: A Dyson Sphere would require more material than all planets in our solar system!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ This is the ultimate engineering project!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've explored a Dyson Sphere!

levels.title: Kardashev Scale
levels.miniStory: The Kardashev Scale measures civilization advancement! Match each type.
levels.hint: Humans are currently Type 0.7 civilization!
levels.funFact: We might reach Type I in 100-200 years!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ How advanced can civilizations become?
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You understand cosmic civilization levels!

levels.title: Fermi Paradox
levels.miniStory: If aliens exist, where are they? Explore this cosmic mystery!
levels.hint: The universe is huge and old - aliens should be everywhere!
levels.funFact: Maybe aliens are hiding, or we're the first, or they're too far away!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ The universe is silent... why?
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've pondered the great silence!

levels.title: Drake Equation
levels.miniStory: The Drake Equation estimates alien civilizations! Navigate through the calculation.
levels.hint: The Drake Equation multiplies factors to estimate alien civilizations!
levels.funFact: Depending on the numbers, there could be 1 or 1 million alien civilizations!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's calculate how many aliens exist!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You've used the Drake Equation!

levels.title: SETI Search
levels.miniStory: SETI searches for alien signals! Match search methods.
levels.hint: SETI has been searching for 60+ years!
levels.funFact: You can help SETI by running SETI@home on your computer!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's search for alien signals!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ You're now a SETI researcher!

levels.title: Radio Signals
levels.miniStory: If aliens send radio signals, we might detect them! Show the detection process.

puzzleData.instruction: Show how we'd detect alien signals!

levels.hint: Radio waves travel at light speed across space!
levels.funFact: The 'Wow!' signal in 1977 might have been from aliens - we still don't know!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸš€ Let's listen for alien broadcasts!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸš€ Incredible! You've mastered space exploration! You're a true Space Master!
